meanings.definition: The act of making something formal or official.
meanings.sent1: The formalization of the contract was necessary for it to be legally binding.
meanings.sent2: The formalization of their partnership was celebrated with a signed agreement.
meanings.sent3: The formalization of the dress code led to everyone wearing suits and ties to work.
meanings.sent4: The formalization of the ceremony turned a simple gathering into an elegant event.
meanings.sent5: The formalization of the decision brought clarity and structure to the process.

meanings.definition: The process of giving a definite or official form to something.
meanings.sent1: The formalization of the plan ensured that every detail was carefully considered.
meanings.sent2: The formalization of the document made it easier to understand and follow.
meanings.sent3: The formalization of the recipe turned cooking into a precise science.
meanings.sent4: The formalization of the design transformed the concept into a tangible product.
meanings.sent5: The formalization of the schedule helped everyone stay organized and on track.

meanings.definition: The action of following a set of rules or procedures in a formal manner.
meanings.sent1: The formalization of the process ensured that every step was completed correctly.
meanings.sent2: The formalization of the protocol was crucial for maintaining order in the organization.
meanings.sent3: The formalization of the game rules made playing more structured and fair.
meanings.sent4: The formalization of the guidelines helped prevent any misunderstandings or confusion.
meanings.sent5: The formalization of the policy promoted consistency and accountability within the team.
